hit-animations.name: Show hit or miss animations
hit-animations.hint: Requires Sequencer and JB2A animations! Enable or disable hit or miss animations. Disable if you do not have the JB2A patreon module or Sequencer loaded!

hit-sounds.name: Play sounds on hit
hit-sounds.hint: Requires Sequencer! Play sounds when target is hit by a ranged attack

sound-select.name: Select hit sounds
sound-select.hint: Select the sounds you want to be played when a token lands a hit on another

dv-display-show.name: Show DV Display on token hover
dv-display-show.hint: Shows the DV of all equipped ranged weapons when hovering over another token. Have the token selected you want as source and hover over the token you want to hit

dv-display-combat-only.name: Show DV Display in combat only
dv-display-combat-only.hint: The DV Display is only shown on hover if there is current an active combat encounter

dv-display-position.name: Position of the DV Display at the token
dv-display-position.hint: Sets the position where the DV Display should be shown right next to the hovered token

missed.evade: {attacker} missed {target} by {dv-diff+1} according to the ranged DV ({dv})! Roll damage IF they have declared that they are dodging AND your roll has beat their evasion roll!

hit.evade: {attacker} beats the ranged DV ({dv}, {dv-diff} over) to hit {target} by {dv-diff-1}! Roll damage IF they have NOT declared that they are dodging OR your roll has beat their evasion roll
